Question
========
When a wave travels from one medium to another, which properties must be the same 
for both the incident and transmitted waves? **Select all that apply.**

Answerlist
----------
* frequency
* period
* wavelength
* speed


Solution
========
The frequency and the period are the same for both the incident and transmitted waves.
